0011000111010010 0001100000001010 0 -> sum: 0100100111011100, cout: 0
0101111100001100 1011010110101001 0 -> sum: 0001010010110101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
